condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Computerized Accounting System | Description :The Recipient shall upgrade the existing computerized accountingsystem in place at CS REF to be acceptable to the Association. | Due Date :01-Oct-2014
Finance Agreement :External Audit | Description :The Recipient shall recruit an external auditor acceptable to the Association. |Due Date :01-Oct-2014

Finance Agreement :Indigenous Peoples Planning Framework | Description :The Recipient shall prepare the Indigenous Peoples PlanningFramework, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association, and shall ensure that it is consulted upon and disclosed inaccordance with the Policies of the Association. | Due Date :20-Jun-2014

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Manual | Description :The Recipient shall update the Project Implementation Manual inform and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :20-Jun-2014

Finance Agreement :Section | Description :The Borrower shall establish and maintain, at all times, a financial management systemincluding records and accounts, and shall prepare related financial statements in accordance with accounting standards acceptableto the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

title.narrative: Number of Supreme Audit Insitution annual report published
The number of non-eligible civil servants removed from the payroll (deceased, retired, others)
Number of supported directorates in the MoF that have reestablished basic functions
Number of months of eligible civil servant salaries in non-security sectors paid
Percentage of civil servants of which HR data are update in the payroll
Percentage of health workers who have resumed work in districts where security has improved
Percentage of teachers who have resumed work in the districts where security has improved
Ratio of revenue recorded at the Customs Directorate to revenue collected from the commercial banks
Ratio of revenue recorded at the Tax directorate to revenue collected from the commercial banks
Percentage of staff from Customs Directorate whom have resumed work
Time elapsed between planned pay day and actual pay day
Treasury Directorate has reduced annual financial statements backlog.
Ratio of wages and salary to GDP
Direct project beneficiaries (of which female) and not comprising the new recruited: number of civil servants paid in non-security sector
Percentage of investment projects from pilot ministries that complied with the new PIM arrangements
Percentage of central government accounts centralized in the Single Treasury Account
